Label.en: One of the first things to happen was that a public clock was added outside the Conciergerie in 1371
Label.fr: L'un des premiers événements ultérieurs fut l'ajout d'une horloge publique à l'extérieur de La Conciergerie en 1371
Label.es: One of the first things to happen was that a public clock was added outside the Conciergerie in 1371
Label.zh: One of the first things to happen was that a public clock was added outside the Conciergerie in 1371

Label.en: It was the first ever public clock in France!
Label.fr: C'était la toute première horloge publique en France!
Label.es: It was the first ever public clock in France!
Label.zh: It was the first ever public clock in France!

Label.en: It was destroyed in the Revolution, and subsequently restored (Like everything in Paris!)
Label.fr: Elle a été détruite pendant La Révolution, puis restauré ensuite (comme beaucouop de choses à Paris!)
Label.es: It was destroyed in the Revolution, and subsequently restored (Like everything in Paris!)
Label.zh: It was destroyed in the Revolution, and subsequently restored (Like everything in Paris!)

Label.en: After the king left, the conciergerie top floors were used for Parliament
Label.fr: Après le départ du roi, les étages supérieurs des bâtiment ont été utilisés par le parlement
Label.es: After the king left, the conciergerie top floors were used for Parliament
Label.zh: After the king left, the conciergerie top floors were used for Parliament

Label.en: And the lower floors were a cavernous prison complex! Spooky!
Label.fr: Et les étages inférieurs par une effrayante prison!
Label.es: And the lower floors were a cavernous prison complex! Spooky!
Label.zh: And the lower floors were a cavernous prison complex! Spooky!

Label.en: That's the entrance: but don't be fooled by how it looks... the cells were notoriously horrible...
Label.fr: Voici l'entrée mais ne te fie pas aux apparences... de façon notoires les cellules étaient horribles...
Label.es: That's the entrance: but don't be fooled by how it looks... the cells were notoriously horrible...
Label.zh: That's the entrance: but don't be fooled by how it looks... the cells were notoriously horrible...
